ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Quest Gems help needed (35KB Picture included)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I want to thank everyone for their help. I finally got my last crushed coral yesterday and finished my Thurg quest. I then proceeded to complete the extra
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I want to thank everyone for their help. I finally got my last crushed
coral yesterday and finished my Thurg quest. I then proceeded to complete
the extra little task to get the custom helm. I can not recall the name of
the NPC, but if you have a quest helm from a Kael helm drop you can do this
also. The NPC is located in a room to the left of Dain in Icewell Keep. Just
ask the 3 NPC in that room "what helm?" and he well tell you what to do.

Ok, now that I have gone with the crazy looking Helm, tell me what you think
of the look.

Here is a picture of my new helm. Btw, I hope I don't get in trouble for
posting a file, but I made it a pretty small in size.

Don't laugh too hard :-)

<<1 Gnome Quest Helm.jpg>>

Thanks all,

Jeff




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
